publication.title: Catalysis in extreme field environments: a theoretical case study of strongly ionized SiO2 nanoparticle surfaces
publication.author: T. M. Linker, R. Dagar, A. Feinberg, S. Sahel-Schackis, K. Nomura, A. Nakano, F. Shimojo, P. Vashishta, U. Bergmann, M. F. Kling, and A. M. Summers
